errite.cogs package¶

Submodules¶

errite.cogs.daCommands module¶

errite.cogs.daCommands.checkTokenValid(token)¶

Method ran to check if a token is valid, Login tokens on DeviantArt last for 60 minutes.

Parameters:token (string) – The artist’s name that owns the folder.
Returns:int (0 means valid, any other number corresponds with the DeviantArt HTTP Error Code)
errite.cogs.daCommands.daHasDeviations(artist, accesstoken)¶

Method ran to check if a an artist has Deviations on DA by checking their Gallery All View.

Parameters:
  • artist (string) – The name of the artist who’s deviations we are working with. This is needed for json references
  • accesstoken (string) – The name of the gallery folder we are working with. Used for json references
Returns:

bool
errite.cogs.daCommands.findFolderUUID(artist, bool, folder, accesstoken)¶

Method ran to get the List of Folders from an artist and determine if the folder requested exists. If it exists then it returns the UUID Returns None if it does not exist.

Parameters:
  • artist (string) – The artist’s name to request the folder’s UUID id’s from
  • bool (bool) – Whether mature folders will show or not.
  • folder (string) – The Exact folder name to grab the UUID of
  • accesstoken (string) – The DA Access token to use for this query
Returns:

array
errite.cogs.daCommands.getAllFolderArrayResponse(artist, bool, accesstoken, offset)¶

Method ran to get the Gallery Folder data all view from deviantart’s API.

Parameters:
  • artist (string) – The artist’s name that owns the folder.
  • bool (bool) – Whether mature folders will show or not.
  • accesstoken (string) – The DA Access token to use for this query
  • offset (int) – The offset value at which to request the gallery folder contents from. The starting value
Returns:

array
errite.cogs.daCommands.getFolderArrayResponse(artist, bool, folder, accesstoken, offset)¶

Method ran to get the list of folders from an artist from deviantart’s API.

Parameters:
  • artist (string) – The artist’s name that owns the folder.
  • bool (bool) – Whether mature folders will show or not.
  • folder (string) – The Exact folder name to grab the UUID of
  • accesstoken (string) – The DA Access token to use for this query
  • offset (int) – The offset value at which to request the gallery folder contents from. The starting value
Returns:

array
errite.cogs.daCommands.getGalleryFolder(artist, bool, folder, accesstoken, foldername, inverted)¶

Method ran to get deviation id’s of new deviations in the folder and returns the new deviation url’s in a array.

Parameters:
  • artist (string) – The artist’s name to request the folder’s deviation id’s from
  • bool (bool) – Whether mature images will show or not.
  • folder (string) – The UUID associated with the folder we are grabbing deviations from.
  • accesstoken (string) – The DA Access token to use for this query
  • foldername (string) – The Exact folder name in the artists gallery
  • inverted (bool) – Whether newest deviations are at the top for this folder.
Returns:

array
errite.cogs.daCommands.getGalleryFolderArrayResponse(artist, bool, folder, accesstoken, offset)¶

Method ran to get the Gallery Folder data from deviantart’s API.

Parameters:
  • artist (string) – The artist’s name that owns the folder.
  • bool (bool) – Whether mature folders will show or not.
  • folder (string) – UUID of the folder that data is being grabbed from
  • accesstoken (string) – The DA Access token to use for this query
  • offset (int) – The offset value at which to request the gallery folder contents from. The starting value
Returns:

array
errite.cogs.daCommands.getGalleryFolderFT(artist, bool, folder, accesstoken, foldername)¶

Method ran to get the GalleryFolder data devations id’s and populate it into the json file. This method in particular is only ran on the first time/when a new folder is added.

Parameters:
  • artist (string) – The artist’s name to request the folder’s deviation id’s from
  • bool (bool) – Whether mature images will show or not.
  • folder (string) – The UUID associated with the folder we are grabbing deviations from.
  • accesstoken (string) – The DA Access token to use for this query
  • foldername (string) – The Exact folder name in the artists gallery
Returns:

array
errite.cogs.daCommands.getGalleryFolderOLD(artist, bool, folder, accesstoken, foldername)¶
errite.cogs.daCommands.getToken(clientsecret, clientid)¶

Method ran to grab a new token from DA and return it, Login tokens on DeviantArt last for 60 minutes.

Parameters:
  • clientsecret (string) – The clientsecret associated with your app registered on DeviantArts Dev Area.
  • clientid (string) – The clientid associated with your app registered on DeviantArts Dev Area.
Returns:

string
errite.cogs.daCommands.getallFolder(artist, bool, accesstoken, inverted)¶

Method ran to get the all view data devations id’s and populate it into the json file. This method is different from the getGalleryFolderFT. Designed with Slices in mind This method in particular is only ran on the first time/when a new folder is added.

Parameters:
  • artist (string) – The artist’s name to request the folder’s deviation id’s from
  • bool (bool) – Whether mature images will show or not.
  • accesstoken (string) – The DA Access token to use for this query
  • inverted – If the folder is inverted or not.
Returns:

array
errite.cogs.daCommands.getallFolderFT(artist, bool, accesstoken, inverted)¶

Method ran to get the all view data devations id’s and populate it into the json file. This method is different from the getGalleryFolderFT. Designed with Slices in mind This method in particular is only ran on the first time/when a new folder is added.

Parameters:
  • artist (string) – The artist’s name to request the folder’s deviation id’s from
  • bool (bool) – Whether mature images will show or not.
  • accesstoken (string) – The DA Access token to use for this query
  • inverted – If the folder is inverted or not.
Returns:

array
errite.cogs.daCommands.refindFolderUUID(artist, bool, folder, accesstoken)¶
